build n0425

Not sure if this is reproducable...can't get my workbench to start anymore. (will enter separate report)

- start Eclipse
- open CVS Repos view
- create anonymous connection to dev.eclipse.org
- checked out org.eclipse.jface
- switched back to the Java perspective
- added a new foundation VM (Windows -> Prefs -> Installed JREs)
- opened the manifest with the Plug-in Manifest Editor
- made some changes, changed the EE

Then when I went to File -> New, my workbench exited immediately. (it did show the save progress dialog though)

This is the exception in my log file.
